title: ISic003567. Funerary epitaph for Seberina
body:
1[† ἐνθ]άδε κῖτε ἡ πολ-
2[λῆς μ]νήμης Σεβηρῖνα
3[ἔζησ]ε α´ ἔτη πλέω(ν) ἤ(λα) τ-
4[τον] ἐ̣τελεύτα τῇ
5[πρὸ? ΙΙ]Ι̣ΧΧ καλανδῶν
6[Ὀκ?]το(β)ρίων

1[.....]ΑΔΕΚΙΤΕΗΠΟΛ
2[....]ΝΗΜΗΣΣΕΒΗΡΙΝΑ
3[....]ΕΑΕΤΗΠΛΕΩΗΤ
4[...].ΤΕΛΕΥΤΑΤΗ
5[.....].ΧΧΚΑΛΑΝΔΩΝ
6[..]ΤΟΡΙΩΝ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Manganaro 2005;
  • 2: Manganaro: Σεβερῖνα (corrected by Tybout ap. SEG)
  • 6: The reading of the month is extremely uncertain and requires revision

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Here lies Seberina of dear memory. She lived 1 year more or less. She died on the 17th day before the kalends of October(?)

commentary

bibliography

    54.0943 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 Bacci and Rizzo 1997-1998 367 tav.89 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002173 Manganaro 2005 36 n.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001799 Muscolino 2011-2012 226 G9 fig.10 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002215
